sn56.28:1.3: Dukkham ariyasaccam, dukkhasamudayam ariyasaccam, dukkhanirodham ariyasaccam, dukkhanirodhagamini patipada ariyasaccam.
sn56.28:1.4: Sadevake loke samarake sabrahmake sassamanabrahmaniya pajaya sadevamanussaya tathagato ariyo;
sn56.28:2.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
